props.title: Number of bindings
props.query: SELECT average(`rabbitmq.exchange.bindings`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Delivered and acknowledged
props.query: SELECT average(`exchange.messagesDeliveredAcknowledgedPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Messsages redelivered
props.query: SELECT average(`exchange.messagesRedeliveredPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Messages returned unroutable
props.query: SELECT average(`exchange.messagesReturnedUnroutablePerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Messages published
props.query: SELECT average(`exchange.messagesPublishedPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Messages published per channel
props.query: SELECT average(`rabbitmq.rabbitmq.exchange.messagesPublishedPerChannelPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Messages published into a queue
props.query: SELECT average(`rabbitmq.rabbitmq.exchange.messagesPublishedQueuePerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
